      • getAsset

        public static Asset getAsset(com.centurylink.mdw.cache.impl.AssetKey key)
        Asset names like 'myPackage/myAsset.ext' designate package-specific versions. (or myPackage.MyCustomJavaClass for dynamic Java or Script).

      • getLatestAssets

        public static Asset getLatestAssets(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String language,
                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributeValues)
        Get the latest asset whose name and custom attributes match the parameters. Asset names like 'my.pkg/myAsset.ext' designate package-specific versions; however, package is ignored when selecting by custom attributes.
